form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: DEPARTMENT OF STATE FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS, FS-398

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/6/2023 M 8 193 2542.8 PLACHERAS TRANSIT CAMP DEPARTMENT OF STATE KUALA LUMPUR. FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA DATE OF EXAMINATION MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS 19 APR 1979 At the request of the American Consul at CITY COUNTRY Kuala Lumpur Malaysia. I certify that on the above date I examined NAME AGE SEX NGUYEN THI NGOI 68 1- WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON A23-792-632 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Insanity Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: BP: 150/90 (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class - A, B, or C - diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Pterygian both eyes, covers the can fuel part of right eye. Fingervision / foot migre eye 20/400 left eye. Has t be followed us is U.S.A. JVA Into T NON-SIGNIFICANT FINDINGS Chest X-ray MARATHON COMMITTEE Services Medical For N COMPUTER MEDIC LAB. SDN, BHD. VDRL-NON REACTING KUALA LUMPUR Blood serological report from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TITLER. TORE A. NITTER DATE OF FINAL REPORT FS-398 10-74 TECHNICAL ADVISOR 9 ICEM MEDICAL OFFICER. 26/4/79 FORM *Continue on reverse side if necessary.
